title: Carrie Steinmetz
text:
Professional Life
Carrie and her business/dance partner, Emmanuel Pierre-Antoine, are the owners and managers of EPA Dance Studio NYC, the largest and most welcoming ballroom dance studio in the city. Come dance with us!



Philanthropic Work
Carrie is the former board chair and a big supporter of Dancing Classrooms. Through the joyful art and practice of partner dancing, Dancing Classrooms cultivates engaged learners, collaborative leaders, and inclusive spaces.

title: Celebrate Carrie’s Fiftieth Birthday on Anguilla!
text:
A Message from the Birthday Girl:
You are so important As our dear friends who are important to us - even if we don't manage to connect as often as one would hope - we are so happy to invite you to (Carrie's version of) paradise to enjoy some sun, sand, surf, reggae, food, drinks, people, …. Oh and a Birthday!


HELP - Things You Have to Do
Carrie is providing the hotel, transportation and some fabulous meals and activities, but you still have to do a few things:

Block out the dates March 22-26.


IMPORTANT :Fill Out This Form ASAP
To reserve a seat on the private jet you must enter your personal and passport info HERE. Where it asks hotel reservation number enter N/A. The departure airport is “HPN” and the arrival is “AXA” Round trip, of course. For passenger email, use “carebearnyc@gmail.com.” We can’t reserve your seat on the private jet until this form is submitted!


Arrange your own transportation to Westchester County Airport on March 22.





Things to Get You Excited About Anguilla
The Aurora Anguilla Resort
The Moonsplash Reggae Festival
Carrie’s Happy Place


Share your questions, thoughts and lavish praise for Carrie below. Do not put any personal information in the comments.
